articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Russia visit hailed 
    Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il's recent visit to the Far Eastern region of the Russian Federation greatly contributed to strengthening international solidarity with the Korean people's cause under the changing international situation.
 The Asian Regional Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association and the Indian Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification said this in a joint statement on August 24.    
 The joint statement extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Il in the name of the Indian and Asian people who love justice and peace.

articles.content:
Senior party and state officials join youth celebrating their day
    Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Hong Song Nam and other senior party and state officials and leading officials of the provincial, city and county party and power organs and working people's organizations on August 28 joined youth of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Plant, the Pyongyang Thermal-Power Complex and the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine and other industrial establishments, cooperative farms and universities in significantly marking the day of youth.
 The youth and senior party and state officials placed floral baskets and bunches of flowers before statues of President Kim Il Sung and the monuments to on-site instructions given by the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.    
 The officials congratulated the youth on their labor achievements and encouraged them and enjoyed the holiday, joining the youth in dancing and playing diverse games.
